verbs.description: [ARG0: “ The View ” co - host Meghan McCain] [V: lost] [ARG1: her manners] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: when she rudely attacked adult film actress Stormy Daniels for being at the federal court with Donald Trump 's longtime attorney Michael Cohen] .
